contest-event.event-date:
May 5, 1985 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section B) 20 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-section-b
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £65 and shield, 2nd £35 and cup, 3rd £25, 4th £15. March contest -1st(£10 and cup) Marsden, 2nd (£5) Linthwaite. Hymn tune -1st (£10 and cup) Linthwaite, 2nd (£5) Uppermill. 7 bands competed.
April 6, 2012, 8:36 a.m. June 27, 2016, 6:32 p.m.
1 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Jack Haigh First Suite in Eb [arr. Herbert]
2 Hinchliffe Mill Band R. Broadhead A Malvern Suite
3 Uppermill Band Harold Robinson A Barchester Suite
4 Scapegoat Hill Peter Wadsworth Four Little Maids
Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band John Iredale Sinfonietta [Horovitz]
Unknown Result Marsden Silver Prize Band Tony Jaeger-Fozard Quo Vadis?
Unknown Result Shepley Steve Platten Four Little Maids
Withdrawn Emley Brass Band Norman Hudson
